fields.title: Complete Django project setup
fields.description: Set up the Django todo application with models, views, and templates. Ensure all CRUD operations are working correctly.

fields.title: Write unit tests
fields.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the Task model and all views. Test create, read, update, and delete operations.

fields.title: Add user authentication
fields.description: Implement user authentication so that each user can only see and manage their own tasks. Add login and registration pages.

fields.title: Style the application
fields.description: Improve the UI/UX with modern CSS styling. Add responsive design for mobile devices and improve the overall visual appeal.

fields.title: Deploy to production
fields.description: Deploy the Django todo application to a production server. Set up environment variables, configure the database, and ensure security best practices are followed.
